titleStmt.title: Serenissimo principi, Jacobo, Albaniæ & Eboraci Duci, &c. Scotiam jamprimùm pervenienti, ac frequentibus stipato nobilbus, à metropoli Edinburgo, maximo cum plausu, alacriter recepto; VIII. Kal: Decembres, 1679. Congratulatio.

Serenissimo principi, Jacobo, Albaniæ & Eboraci Duci, &c. Scotiam jamprimùm pervenienti, ac frequentibus stipato nobilbus, à metropoli Edinburgo, maximo cum plausu, alacriter recepto; VIII. Kal: Decembres, 1679. Congratulatio.

notesStmt.note: Imperfect: tightly bound, stained with loss of text.
Place and date of publication suggested by Wing (2nd ed.).
P. [2] contains: Idem author. Prænominato principi, [Reg]is ex mandato, Angliam repetenti, ac XIII Kal: Mart. 1680 ... Valedicens.
Reproduction of original in: National Library of Scotland.
